attributes.action: Make parents pay - CMS abolish nil payment rewards to stop Non paying parents
attributes.background: For years my ex has been awarded nil payment, I have always provided for my children ...my ex has declared no job so doesn't have to pay any maintenance or pay his arrears.  Whilst running multiple business with his wife. So easy for him and others to escape paying for their responsibilities.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd like to see changes to the child maintenance system, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
